top_opportunities.question: Will the Denver Nuggets win the 2026 NBA Finals?
top_opportunities.description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Denver Nuggets win the 2026 NBA Finals. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

top_opportunities.question: Will Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez win the 2028 Democratic presidential nomination?
top_opportunities.description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the named individual wins and accepts the 2028 nomination of the Democratic Party for U.S. president. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.
